overview:
Bryan is the co-founder & CTO of Giftiki, where he brings a diverse background of technology & entrepreneurial experience. His technology & founding interest span back to the late-90s, where in 1998 Bryan founded Exus, his first tech company. Prior to Giftiki, Bryan served as the Interim CTO & VP Engineering for the 7th largest global travel agency. In that position, he introduced a line of mobile applications, restructured the IT department, initiated a project to oversee PCI compliance & oversaw an industry-first product that resulted in a $1m cost savings annually.

Bryan concentrates on leading the engineering team along with product at Giftiki. In addition, he is actively involved in the company’s strategy & business decisions.
